title: How to create a club in New Client of lol
body: I downloaded the knew client and i do not know how create a club can you help me?

replies.body: Currently, you can create a club on the updated client by selected Profile -> Clubs -> Click the top panel where where the club title would be and select Start A Club.  Hope that helps!
So we can't create a club if we're already in one?
Yea i think so havent found it yet, but you can easyily change back to the old launcher for that real fast
You can do what they said above, and if you're in a club you can select the arrows you'd choose to switch between clubs, and there will be a "create a club" or something within those words.

I did everything everyone said but when i click at the club name it doesn't say Start A Club can u pls help me?
{{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}
You can only be in 3 clubs at a time so if you are in more clubs than that try to leave one
I think you need to be ranked.
Has this been addressed yet? You cant create a club if your already in one club?
yea you can, theres arrows man theyre next to the club name, really small
If this is still unsolved, you cannot own 2 clubs at one time so you have transfer ownership of another club you are in

So, clicking the arrows (or the club name for that matter) does indeed bring up a list of the clubs I am in. However, there is not an option to create a club. I am currently attempting to reload the old client to create a club.  Please say the devs are on this. 

Thank you!{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

I wish it wasn't this way in the new client although I understand the entire thing is completely new code.
I liked being able to check if clan tags were available on the old client, but on the new client, you HAVE to get 5 or more people in your group before the function even unlocks it seems. Which made it very easy to see what type of club I wanted to make. If it relied on a specific tag I couldn't get, I'd choose a different club name. Le-sigh.
I went on profiles but for.some reason my clubs button stays on grey and will not open if I click it. Is there a certain level I have to be for the club button to unlock?
